config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
opts=()
[[ "${untracked}" -eq 1 ]] || opts+=('--untracked-files=no')

for input in "${@}"
do
  repo_root="$(git -C "${input}" rev-parse --show-toplevel)"

  # If clean, skip to next loop iteration
  [[ -z "$(git -C "${repo_root}" status "${opts[@]}" --porcelain)" ]] && continue

  # If we reach here, at least one repo is not clean
  echo -n 'false'
  exit 0
done

# If we reach here, all repos are clean
echo -n 'true'
taskDescription: Check if repository contains uncommited or untracked files
